name: 5th Annual Smart City Expo 2018, Melbourne
content: Smart City Expo combines the power of co-located conference with state-of-the-art expo floor in order to educate people towards smart cities and urban planning technologies, strive for innovation, promote business and connect thousands of attendees from around the globe. The conference program covers Smart City Vertical Applications such as Smart Grid, Smart Transportation, Smart Health, Industry 4.0, Artificial Intelligence, Virtual Reality, Cloud Computing, Smart Building Management Systems, Enterprise IoT, Fog computing, Big Data Analytics and Smart Governance.
